exceptions.exn: In environment f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b Hf2 : f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ a : bool l, m : lb IHl : lb_pointwise l nil ⪯ lb_pointwise l m Unable to unify "⟘ :: ?M1440 ⪯ nil" with "f a ⟘ :: map (fun x : bool => f x ⟘) l ⪯ match m with | nil => f a ⟘ :: map (fun x : bool => f x ⟘) l | y :: m => f a y :: lb_pointwise l m end".
Unable to find an instance for the variable l.
No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet +.

In environment H : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b Hf2 : f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ a, b0 : bool l : lb b : bool m : lb IHl : f b0 ⟘ :: map (fun x : bool => f x ⟘) l ⪯ f b0 b :: lb_pointwise l m Unable to unify "nil ⪯ ?M2553" with "f a ⟘ :: f b0 ⟘ :: map (fun x : bool => f x ⟘) l ⪯ f a b :: match m with | nil => f b0 ⟘ :: map (fun x : bool => f x ⟘) l | y :: m => f b0 y :: lb_pointwise l m end".

original: induction l. - simpl. apply in_lb_mask_0. - simpl. apply in_lb_mask_1. destruct l; simpl in *. + apply lb_mask_inv_left in H. destruct H. auto. + apply in_lb_mask_0.
